review: Using the Fire TV Stick everyday. Love it!

review: great! works easily and quickly to find and watch what we want.
author: Chrissie

review: For the price it is a good deal.  Basically gives you the opportunity to stream Netflix, Amazon Prime & Hulu.  The rest of the channels are trivial garbage.  Other than that it works really good and very easy to set up.  I wanted it for Netflix, Amazon Prime & Hulu so it works great for me.
author: crs

review: Extremely easy to implement. Service is great
author: Roger M Williams

review: I really am enjoying it.  I live in the country and my internet is not all that fast.  Still I am able to stream videos without buffering.
author: Precious
